title: adidas x Disney Suru365 Cars Slip-On Shoes
subtitle: Infant & Toddler Sportswear
description:
If your rookie racer is a fan of Disney Pixar's Cars, they'll love these infants' adidas shoes done up in auto-style graphics. With a super-grippy sole, they're designed for toddlers who are as speedy as Lightning McQueen. The big hook-and-loop strap ensures easy fastening.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Wide fit; Hook-and-loop closure; Textile upper; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; ©Disney; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Silver Metallic / Vivid Red; Product code: GY9099

title: Grand Court Shoes
subtitle: Men's Essentials
description: A '70s style reborn. These shoes take inspiration from iconic sport styles of the past and move them into the future. The shoes craft an everyday look with a smooth leather upper. Signature 3-Stripes flash along the sides. Plush midsole cushioning gives comfort to every step.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Leather upper with synthetic leather details; Rubber outsole; Cloudfoam Comfort sockliner; Soft feel; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Royal Blue / Cloud White; Product code: H02062
colors: Cloud White / Core Black / Cloud White

title: Marvel Black Panther Adizero Primeknit Cleats
subtitle: Men's Football
description:
Reveal the superhero inside you. These football cleats take design cues from ""Black Panther"" with a black-dominant upper that has touches of purple and gold. The ultralight adidas PRIMEKNIT upper molds to your feet while bungee laces keep them locked in, so you can move freely while making the big play.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Bungee lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT textile upper; Synthetic lining; TPU stud outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Gold Metallic / Tribe Purple; Product code: GV9288

title: Stabil Next Gen Handball Shoes
subtitle: Men's Training
description:
Next time you hit the changing rooms, make sure your rivals know they've been in a game. These adidas Stabil Next Gen shoes are designed to help you dominate indoor courts. Lightweight and sleek, their adidas PRIMEKNIT upper has heat-pressed sidewalls to add support for every direction shift. The grippy outsole has rounded edges for more natural movement. The BOOST midsole is framed in EVA to provide the perfect balance of cushioning and stability.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT upper; Integrated lateral support and lockdown; BOOST midsole; HEAT.RDY; 360-degree grip pattern with radiused edges; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic  and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Core Black / Grey Three; Product code: GY9284
colors: Grey Two / Team Navy / Team Collegiate Red

title: NMD_V3 Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description:
A play on transparency, these adidas NMD_V3 Shoes continue to build on the NMD franchise's signature expression of tactical tech. Here's what you need to know about the BOOST cushioning: it makes every step feel supported. Which is great, since you take a lot of them throughout the day. The other thing to know is that it's partially encapsulated in TPU, met by TPU heel plugs that signal that these are in fact NMD sneakers. 

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Lace closure; Mesh and TPU upper; Textile lining; BOOST midsole; Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Grey Five / Core Black; Product code: GX2084
colors: Grey One / Off White / Halo Silver

title: Adizero XC Spikes
subtitle: Track & Field
description:
Maintain a confident stride in these adidas running spikes. The Bounce midsole delivers lightweight cushioning and flex where you need it for a comfortable ride. The five-pin rubber outsole provides traction on grass, dirt and mud to help you stay on pace and finish strong. 

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Lace closure; Textile upper; Bounce midsole; Textile lining; Spiked rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Vivid Red / Cloud White / Beam Orange; Product code: GY8420
colors: Cloud White / Night Metallic / Solar Green

title: adidas Stan Smith x LEGO® Shoes
subtitle: Youth Originals
description:
You're never too old to show off your love for LEGO® bricks. The classic and sleek silhouette that made the Stan Smith shoes iconic gets a fun update with these juniors' Stan Smith x LEGO® shoes. The colorful heel tab celebrates this adidas and LEGO Group partnership.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Synthetic leather upper; OrthoLite® sockliner; Rubber cupsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Pantone / Core Black; Product code: GV8972

title: Forum Mid Shoes
subtitle: Youth Originals
description:
An icon gets elevated. These juniors' adidas shoes combine '80s Forum style with modern details. The neutral palette gets a pop of shine courtesy of the metallic 3-Stripes. A textile lining and a molded sockliner ensure that comfort isn't sacrificed for style.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure with adjustable hook-and-loop strap; Leather upper; Textile lining; Molded sockliner; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Silver Metallic / Grey One; Product code: GY7062

description:
The past empowers what is to come. Which is why these juniors' adidas shoes take inspiration from archival running styles and reimagine them for the future. Part of that reimagining is the use of Parley Ocean Plastic. Another part is the plush BOOST midsole, which keeps you comfortable during active days so you can move your way without compromise.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Mesh upper; Textile lining; BOOST midsole; Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Grey One; Product code: GY4279
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Grey Five

description: Ride more. Hang out more. The adidas Five Ten Freerider Pro Canvas Mountain Bike Shoes are as capable on the bike as they are comfortable post ride. An impact-resistant toe box and pedal-gripping Dotty tread with Stealth® S1™ rubber give them their bike cred. A cushioned midsole and casual look keep them versatile for on and off your bike.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Quick-dry synthetic upper; Impact-resistant PORON® toe box; OrthoLite® sockliner; EVA midsole; Stealth® S1 Dotty rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic  and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Dgh Solid Grey / Grey Three / Acid Mint; Product code: GZ1931
colors: Core Black / Bliss Lilac / Beam Orange

description: The Boston Marathon is a race. But it's also a goal and a training plan during all the days it stays on your mind before the big one. The Adizero Boston 11 Shoes are built for mid- to long-distance running. They bring a race-day quality to training, with a propulsive feel that comes from ENERGYRODS, which limit energy loss underfoot. They're fast, but that does not come at the cost of durability — the midsole mixes ultra-light Lightstrike Pro cushioning with durable Lightstrike EVA.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Lightweight mesh upper; Flexible feel with support in key areas; ENERGYRODS limit energy loss; Lightstrike Pro+ cushioning; Midsole drop: 8.5 mm (heel: 39.5 mm / forefoot: 31 mm); Continental™ Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Grey Four / Zero Metalic / Beam Orange; Product code: GY8406
colors: Grey Three / Zero Metalic / Carbon

description:
The TERREX AGRAVIC ULTRA has been created in close collaboration with one of the world's fastest ultra trail runners, EKATERINA MITYAEVA. It is one of the first trail running shoes from adidas to feature a bio-based thermoplastic elastomer (TPE) plate that's made out of 90% renewable carbon.​

​The TPE bio-based plate runs the entire length of the shoe, sandwiched between the midsole and outsole for lightweight, durable rock protection over long-distance mountain trails.​
Created using renewable carbon sources and using bio-based ingredients.​ 
A blend of responsive Boost and ultra-lightweight Lightstrike works with a TPE plate to ensure high-energy return over mountainous terrain that also cushions every stride to help you keep your pace over technical trails.​
details: Lace closure; Open mesh upper with abrasion-resistant weldings, and padded tongue; Snug midfoot with slightly wider toe box; Lightstrike and Boost midsole with carbon plate layer; Dual-layer Achilles protection and midsole rock protection plate; Continental™ Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Wonder Steel / Magic Grey Met / Pulse Lilac; Product code: GX9296
colors: Bliss Lilac / Beam Orange / Pulse Magenta

description: When the adidas Ultraboost debuted in 2015, it set the standard for comfort and performance in a running shoe. Each new release raises the bar, and this one is no exception. These running shoes are built for cold-weather runs, featuring COLD.RDY to keep feet warm. The energy-returning BOOST midsole is reflective, so it shines bright from dusk to dawn. The Continental™ WinterGrip™ Rubber outsole ensures a secure grip on slick streets.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT textile upper; COLD.RDY; Linear Energy Push system; Reflective BOOST midsole; Reflective 3-Stripes; Midsole drop: 10 mm (heel: 25 mm / forefoot: 15 mm); Stretchweb outsole with Continental™ WinterGrip™ Rubber; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Bliss Orange / Beam Green / Core Black; Product code: GZ6877
colors: Magic Beige / Grey One / Impact Orange

description:
Good players create time and space. Great ones leave them both behind. Unlock multidimensional speed in adidas X Speedportal. Additional forefoot studs on the lightweight outsole of these adidas soccer cleats ensure rapid reactions on firm ground. Up top, the soft, coated textile upper includes a supportive flat-knit collar and rigid TPU external heel lock to keep you strapped in for every cut and sprint.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Coated textile upper; External heel lock; Firm ground outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Silver Metallic / Core Black / Solar Yellow; Product code: GW8454
colors: Core Black / Solar Red / Team Solar Green

description: At the foundation of these adidas Retropy E5 shoes is the famed adidas Racing 1, an old-school runner that was all about going the distance. Now these sneakers aren't about speed anymore, though they definitely keep up with the fast pace of the day to day. Plush, ultra-comfortable BOOST cushioning makes sure of that. Stitched suede overlays nod to the OG Racing 1 design, and bungees extended across the 3-Stripes switch things up a bit.
details: Lace closure; Textile upper with stitched suede overlays; BOOST midsole; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Focus Olive / Core White / Beam Orange; Product code: FZ5926
colors: Focus Olive / Core White / Beam Orange

description:
Archival adidas style gets a modern update. Inspired by the original silhouette from 1998, this juniors' take on the Adifom shoes pumps up the comfort with a textile and foam lining. Recycled materials bring the shoe into the present day and beyond.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

description: Timeless style lives on in this reissue of the 1991 Gazelle. These shoes feature the same ultra-soft suede upper and sleek lines of the low-profile build from the '90s.
details: Lace closure; Suede upper; Rubber outsole; Synthetic lining; Imported; Product color: Collegiate Burgundy / Cloud White / Gold Metallic; Product code: B41645
colors: Collegiate Burgundy / Cloud White / Gold Metallic

description: Chase your next PR in these adidas Adizero running shoes. The breathable mesh upper rides on a mix of superlight Lightstrike and resilient Lightstrike Pro. The hybrid makes these shoes fast enough for race day while being able to stand up to everyday training. TORSIONRODS add a soft stiffness that increases force transfer in each stride. The result? A pair of running shoes that help you run faster (and longer) than ever before, all while feeling fresh on your feet.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Lightweight mesh upper; Flexible feel with support in key areas; TORSIONRODS increase force transfer; Lightstrike cushioning; Midsole drop: 8 mm (heel: 27 mm / forefoot: 19 mm); Continental™ Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Grey Three / Zero Metalic / Grey Five; Product code: GV7070

description: When you're out in the city, it's easy to get lost in the sea of people. Set yourself apart from the crowd with these adidas OZELIA shoes. They're based on '90s runners and then transformed to look like the future with fluid, futuristic weldings. And when your days move fast, plush Adiprene cushioning helps you keep the pace.

colors: Core Black / Collegiate Gold / Pulse Blue

description: Approach is everything. The Busenitz Vintage reimagines all the craft and detail Dennis Busenitz demands in a shoe, with a minimalist aesthetic designed for performance. The refined result proves that less is more by leveraging fewer panels, a lower profile and a single-piece shortened tongue, with the locked-in fit and cupsole control of the Busenitz franchise in premium suede.

description:
No matter how far your run is taking you, these adidas by Stella McCartney shoes support every step along the way. With their ultra-light and adaptable design, another block or another mile (maybe make it two) doesn't feel impossible. In fact, with the plush BOOST cushioning matching the energy you're throwing down, it's almost effortless.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

description:
Love your teammates. Respect your rivals. Above all, make the ball your friend. Feel the game in these juniors' adidas Copa Sense turf shoes. Created to fit a range of foot shapes, their comfortable synthetic upper stands out with subtle stitching details. The lug rubber outsole helps you show your class on artificial turf courts. Eye-catching graphics take inspiration from soccer's biggest stage.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

description: The distance running shoe inspired by the idea of perpetual motion and tested over 4,500 km. Adistar combines a soft, lightweight REPETITOR foam platform with REPETITOR +, a firmer foam, to create a dual density midsole. The firmer 15% recycled EVA in the heel protects and helps stabilize any heel strike. Forward propulsion is enhanced by the rocker geometry as well as an overall 6mm drop heel to toe. Strike soft and push forward with a shoe designed to go the distance.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Engineered mesh upper with internal support cage; Lockdown feel; Rocker geometry; REPETITOR+ midsole; Weight: 11.3 ounces; Midsole drop: 6 mm (heel: 37.5 mm / forefoot: 31.5 mm); Continental™ Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic  and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Grey Five; Product code: GX2995
colors: Almost Blue / Altered Blue / Almost Pink

description: Warm summer days are made to be spent on the links. These adidas golf shoes keep you cool with a mesh upper for a ventilated feel. The Bounce midsole offers cushioning and flexibility to keep you comfortable when walking. The spikeless Adiwear outsole provides grip for the course and versatility for your postgame plans.

description: Vintage-inspired for a new era in skateboarding. Nora Vasconcellos' colourful passion for family, progression and inclusivity manifest in her first signature adidas Skateboarding shoe. Inspired by notable vintage classics from the adidas tennis archives, the Nora infuses an extended toe cap with double-layer durability, providing cupsole quality with a vulc aesthetic.

Inspired by the legendary Copa Mundial, the Busenitz was designed to focus on footwork, feel and board control. Just like Dennis himself, the Busenitz's legacy keeps going strong with a silhouette known for its lock-in fit and signature details. Constructed with a premium suede upper, flexible cupsole, molded Adiprene sockliner, and Geofit collar, the Busenitz remains a skateboarding staple.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps and post-consumer household waste, to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

description:
The day is yours to own. Don't hesitate. Step into these juniors' adidas NMD_V3 Shoes and get after it. Building on a line that's always been about progress, they bring next-level comfort to your feet with a responsive BOOST midsole and a snug textile upper. The transparent details? Those add a little touch of futuristic style to keep your look sharp. So go ahead. Get out there. Explore. See what you can create.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

description:
Time and space. It's all relative when you play in a different dimension. Open the gateway to multidimensional speed in adidas X Speedportal. The lug rubber outsole on these soccer shoes keeps you quick on artificial turf while an EVA midsole cushions every step. Up top, the soft, coated textile upper includes a supportive flat-knit collar and rigid TPU external heel lock to keep you strapped in for blink-quick skills.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

description:
Serve for the oceans. Part of an adidas collection created for the world's most famous grass court tournament, these Barricade tennis shoes put the spotlight on plastic waste. Built to control the court, they keep you firmly locked in thanks to their adaptive lacing system and foam Sensepods. Torsion System adds rock-solid stability through every slide and cut, while the Bounce midsole cushions landings. 

Educate and act. Head to Parley for the Oceans website to find out more, sign up and get involved at adidas.com/parley. 

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; Geofit Sensepods; Bounce midsole; Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Orbit Grey; Product code: GX6417

description:
Comfort makes all the difference. Since these kids' Swift Run 22 Shoes are inspired by classic adidas running styles, they're all about keeping up with a fast pace. A soft EVA midsole comes in with lightweight cushioning, so no matter how they're moving, kids feel supported and confident.

Lisa from The Simpsons™ is brave, bright and fun. She's also flashing a peace sign on the side of these kids' adidas shoes. Even if they're not familiar with the beloved character, they'll appreciate the trippy tie-dyed look and comfortable feel of these shoes.

But today, they're for anyone who appreciates retro hoops style. A padded ankle collar and leather upper stay true to their archive predecessors.

description:
Often copied. Never duplicated. The adidas Five Ten Freerider Mountain Bike Shoes deliver legendary flat pedal control to support everything you do on your bike. Just the right blend of casual style makes for easy post-ride transitions. Stealth® S1™ rubber and a Dotty tread keep your feet firmly planted on the pedals. A mix leather and mesh adds durability to keep you riding for seasons to come.

This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

Don't shy away from making a statement. These juniors' adidas NMD_R1 Shoes stay true to the original '80s-inspired silhouette that's become iconic across the globe while introducing two fun patterns to play with. The stretchy mesh upper hugs your feet for comfort on the go. Long commutes and slick city sidewalks are no problem, thanks to energy-returning BOOST midsole cushioning and the grippy rubber outsole beneath your feet.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

Equal parts high-performance bike shoes and everyday trainers, the Five Ten Sleuth DLX Mountain Bike Shoes let you flow between rides, school, work or the coffee shop with all-around laid-back style. description:
"Y-3 is a strong examination of the blend of sport and style and the tension caused by mixing tradition with all that is modern."  — Yohji Yamamoto 

Y-3 introduces the Ajatu Run, a timeless silhouette built on a quintessential running aesthetic. The vintage-look upper is crafted from a material mix of premium suede, layered woven textile and breathable mesh, all finished with rubber detailing. State-of-the-art adidas Lightstrike technology introduces a new level of comfort with an incredibly lightweight midsole.

For Bart from The Simpsons™, life is a game. And with these juniors' adidas shoes, you're set up to play it. You've got the ultimate comfort combo on your feet, with BOOST cushioning that charges up your steps and a soft textile upper that adapts as you go. There's plenty of style here too, from the transparent details to the bright pops of color. Now it's time to have some fun.

The elevated outsole stands out even more with double-layered foxing tape to create extra emphasis on the proportions. Embroidered 3-Stripes add a premium element to the look, making them the perfect balance of high and low, and the perfect shoe to go with everything.

description:
Archival adidas style gets a modern update. Inspired by the original silhouette from 1998, this juniors' take on the Adifom shoes pumps up the comfort with a textile and foam lining. Recycled materials bring the shoe into the present day and beyond.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Lace closure; Textile upper; Textile and foam lining; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Dash Grey; Product code: FZ5638
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Cloud White

description:
The adidas Breast Cancer Awareness Collection is a limited edition product range featuring the Five Ten Freerider, Terrex Agravic, Terrex Free Hiker and adidas UltraBoost, accompanied by an exclusive apparel collection.
The collection brings together pink color detailing with graphic illustrations from athlete Veronique Sandler that unites the mountains, bikes and the great outdoors together in this playful yet powerful collection.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Canvas upper; Textile lining; Impact-resistant toe box; Lightweight EVA midsole; Weight: 10.8 ounces (size 7); Midsole drop: 8 mm (heel: 23 mm / forefoot: 15 mm); Stealth S1 rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Bliss Lilac / Beam Orange; Product code: GZ4706
colors: Core Black / Bliss Lilac / Beam Orange

description: Lucas Puig's precision and style is ingrained in everything he touches. The Puig Indoor takes the signature wavy lines of his cupsole classic and slims the silhouette down with a vulc construction and direct approach. Using premium materials, Adituff toe reinforcement and an Adiprene sockliner, the Puig Indoor is a ready-to-go football-inspired model for skateboarding.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Suede upper; Adituff toe; Adiprene sockliner; EVA midsole; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Cream White; Product code: GY6935
colors: Cloud White / Cloud White / Gum

description:
Performance, comfort and durability are the perfect trifecta for bike shoes. The Five Ten SLEUTH sets standards in all categories. Stealth Marathon rubber, combined with 5.10's Classic Dotty tread, is the benchmark for stickiness (friction) and performance. Comfort comes from an EVA midsole for excellent cushioning and serious pedal power. The upper's targeted blend of canvas and leather is designed for durability, with the bonus of a classically casual look.

Whether you are commuting to class, riding for fun, the Five Ten SLEUTH helps us all  be United By Summits. Consider the Five Ten SLEUTH your all-day companion, on and off the bike.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Leather upper; Biking shoes with street style; Shock-absorbing EVA midsole; Non-marking Stealth® Marathon Classic-Dotty outsole; Imported; Product color: Focus Olive / Orbit Green / Pulse Lime; Product code: GW5446
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Gum M2

description: Let your feet do the talking on the pitch. Express your beautiful game in adidas Gamemode with a choice of styles and designs. Created with a comfortable fit for a wide range of foot shapes, these juniors' soccer cleats offer a cushioned touch thanks to their soft HybridTouch upper. The versatile outsole will help you show your skills on both firm ground and artificial grass. The eye-catching graphics borrow from the beautiful game.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; HybridTouch synthetic upper; TPU heel clip; Hybrid outsole for firm and artificial surfaces; Imported; Product color: Bright Cyan / Cloud White / Solar Red; Product code: GV6876
colors: Carbon / Red / Bright Blue

description:
Go ahead and check all the boxes with these juniors' adidas NMD_R1 V3 Shoes. Breathable. Comfortable. Made with recycled materials. That's a yes to all three. Plus there's the style, like the perforated details, which is also where that breathability comes in. Playing with transparency, the 3-Stripes layer over the perforations, giving a glimpse at them underneath the monochrome sign-off.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; Textile lining; BOOST midsole; Synthetic outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Beam Pink / Beam Pink / Cloud White; Product code: GY4286
colors: Royal Blue / Royal Blue / Grey One

description: Swerve. Control. Power. adidas Predator has all angles covered. Hit the pitch and find your edge in these artificial grass soccer cleats. On top, a low-cut Zone Skin upper includes discrete ribbed sections, each excelling at a different type of cleat-to-ball contact. Underneath, a Power Facet diverts weight to the forefoot for fierce strikes. The adaptive adidas PRIMEKNIT collar locks you in while you establish control.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT upper; Low-cut adidas PRIMEKNIT collar; Zone Skin rubber control zones; Outsole for artificial grass; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Solar Yellow / Power Blue; Product code: GZ6107

description: When the competition heats up on the gridiron, keep your cool with these adidas football cleats. The mesh upper is breathable so your feet stay feeling fresh all game long, while TPU overlays add lightweight durability. The studded TPU outsole delivers dependable traction as you plow through the line of scrimmage.
details: Lace closure; Mesh upper with TPU overlays; Textile lining; Studded TPU outsole; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Gold Metallic / Cloud White; Product code: GX5122
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Grey Five

description:
When there's 90 feet between you and glory, there's no room for an inch of hesitation. Whether you plan to steal second or take the wide turn for extra bases, these adidas baseball cleats have that superlight feel to let you run free. A LIGHTLOCK upper secures your feet while the Lightstrike midsole cushions upon impact without adding weight. Now you can make that highlight-reel catch or turn on the jets to give your team the edge.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; LIGHTLOCK upper; Sock-like fit; Lightstrike midsole; Cleated synthetic outsole; Textile lining; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Team Shock Pink / Cloud White / Clear Pink; Product code: GZ9707
colors: Impact Orange / Beam Orange / Pulse Lilac
